message.body: man, i love carrot juice.
You and Ella both. It makes my throat itchy
can't get enough. seriously considering a juicer.
You should get one...I've often thought my life would be better with a juicer
What are u doing tonight?
coconut is coming over and we're going to watch a movie. the pros are that i don't have to travel and there won't be much talking. what about you?
coconut is so good over text. so conscientious and caring. how can he be so annoying in person? it's incredible.
I wish I could text him so I could see
sampleFWD: Hey if you just wanna come over and watch a movie that's cool too besides being cheaper. I've got some cheap whiskey.
FWD: Hey. So you're welcome to come over for dinner unless you've got a better idea.
what should we do tonight?
I don't know, I will be on the el..so I can go anywhere on the grid. Anything fringey going on?
i will be home by 3:30 and will check. i am easy to please. just seeing you would be nice.
Agreed, we could just meet for coffee or a beer for all I care
yo udon't want to see lightnin bolt, do you?
I haven't seen them for so long, I could be into it
coconut invited us over for dinner first. i don't know...
Hahaha...
we could see some montreal circus performers at the kimmel center at 7. looks cool. $20. emailed you the link.
Hey, leaving bryn mawr now..I need to stop home, so I don't think I will be able to make it by seven
Are you still into coming out? Rain..
right. i suppose you will want to stay in west philly?
No, I don't need to
maybe we should wait to see what's up with the rain.
Ok, I'm going to take a shower then...
i'll check with pete. what time is good for you? i'm just have to go to the store.
I can leave by seven
cool. whenever. i am thinking of thai fried rice and something else maybe. that okay?
Sounds delicious! What can I bring?
just yourself.
I'm on the trolley, see u soon!
that was nice. i'm so glad you saw pete in his element. pretty out of it, right?
It was really nice, thanks so much for having me. He does seem out of it, I'm glad u are going on a vacation soon. Any night you are welcome for dinner and escape!
I keep thinking about you today
really? what are you thinking?
About your quiet dinners..and your impossible situation. How are you?
i just had a 2 hr massage...feellling zonked. might go see a movie a ihouse. you?
i am thinking of you today. how is everything? i hung out with coconut again last night. he was pleasant.
That would be nice, I love camping this time of year. And yeah, I'm kind of anticipating something symptomless, ha.
I can see Sarah from across the grass practicing some sort of dance routine. She is a bit much
sarah who?
The older woman from your gamalang class
haha
hi. do you have a raincoat i could maybe borrow for the week i'm away? i'm trying to not buy a lot of gear.
Yes! It's not insulated, but its sturdy. Will it be cold?
it will get down to 30 at night but i've been instructed to bring a base layer thing and long underwear. do you have one of those high tech shirts? they
're so $.
I wish, I would have to take out a loan
haha. i am stressing over my shoewear, too.
I'm sure, don't underestimate the wild frontier
yes but i don't want to buy boots for $100 that i won't ever wear after, you know? laura said i needed water proof shoes.
I understand...im sure they won't be totally useless, you are an active lady
maybe. i bought these day hikers for china that make my feel fall asleep. so now they sit in my closet and i hate them.
Yikes, you should shed those things!
haha. i can't let them go! coconut and my friend april came into cantina lst night. i hope he's not developing feelings for me.
Oh no! Does he give a vibe, or just a lot of seeing one another? Also, who makes the clogs you wear? I've been trying to find closed back clogs and I haven't had any luck
sanita! i dunno. i just kind of assumed. he always wants to hang.
I mean, yeah, he is probably in love with you, ha. You are kind of a dream girl : )
haha. really?
Of course, you are a total catch.
are you free this tuesday again?
I'm not free Tuesday, I have a riding lesson at school..did you see theres a lecture about the pine barrens on Thursday at Wagner?
riding lesson? i'm working thurs. shld i try to switch?
At school, I'm in the equestrian club, ha. I don't think I can go Thursday, I have a book lecture I have to attend for one of my classes
wow! that is so funny. well just let me know.
are you around tmmrw am? i will be in west philly.
Just early, I have to leave west Philly around ten...what are u doing west?
interviewing for that conservation tech job
Oh yeah, I read your email after I texted. That sounds fun
Could you give me the number again for your masseuse? Her number was in my old phone, and my back is jacked up
And what time will you be west tommorow?
sure.
i have this thing at 10am.
How did it go today?
good. i start monday. i wish it was more than 1 day a week. everyone is so nice. i met the mummy conservator. she's cool and pretty. did you get the mas
sage lady's phone number? just text her an say you're my friend.
Did you text it? I didn't get it..
Is there potential for more shifts in the future?
no. it's limited to 1 day.
Oh thanks, I think the bike ride is getting to my back. At least one day a week will be in the normal world..are u giving up a shift at cantina?
no. i shld only be there 3 days a week.
i'm siorry your back hurts.
It's ok, I haven't been stretching or doing yoga, that's why. Just power riding twice a day with a big heavy back pack..
